title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Thursday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Thursday

Today's hottest deals include a Roomba and a pair of true wireless headphones. (Photo: Reviewed)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Online shopping can be both the best of times, and the worst of times. It's always a thrill to find a product that you've been eyeing finally go on sale, but then the fear can creep in that maybe you can find it for a lower price somewhere else on the web, or there's a promo code you're missing out on, or maybe the retailer jacked up the original price just to trick you. It can be too easy to second-guess a purchase before clicking that "order now" button, but here at Reviewed, we want to take all the guess work out of online shopping for you.

Each day we scour the internet to supply our readers with the absolute best deals, the lowest price drops, and the can't-miss discounts. Naturally a ton of these are found on Amazon, so we compile a list of our top five picks daily. Today, we found some fantastic sales on Dash Air Fryers, iRobot Roombas, and more.

1. Lowest price ever: This popular Roomba

Keep your floors tidy this fall with a new Roomba. (Photo: iRobot)

There's a reason why "Roomba" has become synonymous with robot vacuum in recent years. iRobot is well-known for their high-quality craftsmanship and excellent customer service, which is why Roombas sell like crazy year after year. Though they can err on the more expensive side, right now the iRobot Roomba 980 is at its lowest price ever—$633.99, to be exact—a whopping $265 off its usual retail price. We were wowed by the 980 when we tested it earlier this year, specifically for its connectivity, battery life, and impressive navigational skills that made it the first robot vacuum we'd recommend for multi-room cleaning.

Get the iRobot Roomba 980 for $633.99 (Save $265)

2. Save $15: The trendy Dash Air Fryer

Snack on all your favorite fried foods—without the unhealthy oil. (Photo: Dash)

Everyone knows that fried food just hits the spot sometimes. We all crave some crispy fries and chicken fingers from time to time, but if you want a way to enjoy these snacks in a healthier way, consider investing in an air fryer. This one from Dash comes highly-rated and will look fab on your kitchen counter, especially in the mint color. The compact version of Dash's air fryer scored highly in our tests, so we expect the Deluxe version to perform just as well. Plus, with its 6-quart capacity and built-in oven functionality, you'll be able to whip up air fried veggies and snacks for the whole family in no time at all.

Get the Dash Deluxe Electric Air Fryer + Oven Cooker for $84.99 (Save $15)

3. 20% off: The LifeStraw for clean drinking water anywhere

If you have any hikes planned this fall, you'll want a LifeStraw packed away just in case. (Photo: LifeStraw)

Whether you're going camping or staying in a foreign country with not-so-safe drinking water, the LifeStraw is there to give you access to clean and safe drinking water. Almost 9,000 reviewers swear by it, as it's certified to protect you from bacteria, parasites, and microplastics up to 99.999%, and will filter up to 1,000 gallons of water before you need to replace it. And weighing in at only 2 oz., you'll barely feel it in your backpack so it's ideal for longer hiking trips. Plus, for every Life Straw sold, a school child in need receives safe drinking water for an entire school year, so you can feel extra good about your purchase.

Get the LifeStraw Personal Water Filter for $15.90 (Save $4.05)

4. $100 off: These popular true wireless earbuds

Cut the cord and invest in some true wireless headphones for on the go listening. (Photo: Master & Dynamic)

AirPods aren't the only true wireless earbuds out there with excellent sound quality that'll fit snugly in your ear. These wireless Bluetooth earbuds from Master & Dynamic are extra lightweight, deliver crisp audio, and have a 3.5-hour battery life that can be easily extended with the charging case that holds 3 additional charges, totaling an impressive 14 hours of listening time. Usually retailing for a pricey $299, right now you can save a cool $100 and scoop 'em up for $199 in a ton of colors including coral, tortoiseshell, and steel blue.

Get the Master & Dynamic MW07 True Wireless Earphones for $199 (Save $100)

5. Lowest price ever: This well-reviewed American Crew 3-in-1 wash

Take less time and space in the shower with the American Crew 3-in-1. (Photo: XY Stuff)

For all the low-maintenance men out there, the American Crew 3-In-1 was essentially made for you. It works as a shampoo, conditioner, and bodywash, which will cut down on your time in the shower while still leaving you feeling fresh and clean. According to reviewers it lathers very well and the tea tree leaves them feeling invigorated and smelling great. Even my colleague (with great hair, by the way) swears by the brand.

Get the American Crew 3-In-1 Shampoo Conditioner & Bodywash for $12.94 (Save $7)

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
